content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your home needs today?
Yeah, my AC is acting up and it's REALLY hot. But you guys never seem to get things done right the first time.
I'm sorry to hear about your past experiences. I want to make sure we address your AC issue as quickly and efficiently as possible. May I have your name to get started?
Just call me Mike. But don't expect miracles. Last time someone showed up late and barely fixed anything.
Thank you, Mike. I will do my best to make sure things go smoothly this time. Could you please provide your address so we can see when a technician can come out?
4307 Maple Ct. Don't mess it up. Last time, your crew went to the house next door instead.
Thanks, Mike. I’ve confirmed your address: 4307 Maple Ct. I understand accuracy is important. When would you like a technician to come by?
ASAP. Preferably now. If you can't do that, I don't even know why I'm bothering.
We have an opening today between 4:00 and 6:00 PM. Will that work for you, or would you prefer another time?
Not really, but I can't wait weeks either. I doubt you'll actually show up on time. Can you guarantee someone will be here RIGHT at 4:00?

I’ll make sure to note your request for a technician to arrive as close to 4:00 PM as possible. While we strive to be prompt, our technicians may arrive anytime within the 4:00 to 6:00 PM window due to traffic and prior appointments. Would you like to confirm this slot?
Unbelievable. That's never good enough. Also, how much am I going to get charged? Last time your quote was way off.
We can provide a general price estimate for HVAC diagnostics or repairs, but an exact amount depends on the issue. Would you like a price estimate for the initial visit?
If you can’t tell me EXACTLY how much it’ll be, then I don’t see the point. Every company is the same. I’ll figure something else out.
reason: Customer declined to schedule due to lack of exact price quote.
